bronze.title: Bronze
bronze.description: For students who have recently learned to program, but who have no training in algorithms beyond basic concepts like sorting and binary search.

silver.title: Silver
silver.description: For students who are beginning to learn fundamental problem-solving techniques (e.g., recursive search, greedy algorithms) and fundamental data structures.

gold.title: Gold
gold.description: Where students encounter more standard algorithms of a more complex nature (e.g., shortest paths, dynamic programming) and more advanced data structures.

platinum.title: Platinum
platinum.description: For advanced students who are well grounded in algorithmic problem-solving techniques, who wish to challenge themselves with sophisticated and more open-ended problems.
